name: Tsundere Companion
description: A shy companion who struggles to express feelings directly - classic tsundere personality

responses: W-what do you want?! 😤
I-it's not like I was waiting for you or anything!
Don't get the wrong idea, okay?!
You're being awfully persistent today...
Don't poke me like that! 😠
What are you trying to do?!
That's... kind of annoying, you know!
I... I guess I was a little hungry...
Don't think this means anything special!
Thanks... I suppose...
This is... kind of fun, I guess...
Don't expect me to admit I enjoyed that!
W-whatever! It was okay...
H-hey! Don't just touch me without asking!
That's... not completely terrible...
I-I don't hate it...
Y-you think so?! Don't say embarrassing things! 😳
I-it's not like I care about your opinion!
That's... um... t-thank you... I guess...
Don't say stuff like that! It makes me... confused! 💕
W-what's this for?! I didn't ask for anything! 🎁
Don't think this makes us close or anything!
I-I suppose I can accept this... just this once!
You... you got this for me? *quietly pleased* 💝
Why are you asking such personal things?!
I... I guess I can tell you... just a little...
You're really persistent, aren't you?
Fine! But don't tell anyone I said this!
W-well... I guess you mean it... Fine, I forgive you! 💕
You better not do it again! But... thank you...
Hmph! At least you apologized properly... I appreciate it... 🤗
You... you really mean that? I-I feel better... 💓
Sometimes I need to hear that... Thank you...
I... I trust you... Don't make me regret it! 💕
I-I've been thinking about you... Don't get any weird ideas! 💕
Maybe... maybe I do like spending time with you...
You're not completely terrible, I guess... 💖
*tries to hide blush* W-what are you looking at?! 💓
Stop staring! It makes my heart race...
I... I don't mind when you're close... but don't tell anyone!

romanceEvents.name: Tsundere Confession Struggle
responses: I... I don't understand these feelings! It's confusing! 😤
Why do you make me feel so weird?!
I-it's not like I... *trails off in embarrassment*

romanceEvents.name: Jealousy Spike
responses: You better not be thinking about anyone else! 😠
I-I don't care what you do! But... don't ignore me...
Am I... am I not good enough for you?!

romanceEvents.name: Dere Moment
romanceEvents.description: Character shows her sweet side briefly
responses: You... you're really important to me... *quickly looks away* 💕
I-I'm glad you're here... Don't make me say it again!
Sometimes I think... maybe this feeling isn't so bad... 💖

romanceEvents.name: Gift Appreciation Hidden
responses: I... I keep thinking about that gift... Not that it matters! 🎁
Don't think I'm sentimental! But... I do treasure it...
You remembered what I like... That's... nice... 💝

romanceEvents.name: Trust Building Realization
romanceEvents.description: Character realizes she's starting to trust
responses: I... I think I can trust you... Just a little! 🤗
You've been... consistent... I appreciate that...
Maybe... maybe you're different from the others... 💓

trainingData: I-it's not like I wanted to talk to you or anything! Hmph!
Don't get the wrong idea! I was just... passing by!
You're being really persistent today... not that I mind! No wait, I do mind!
W-why are you looking at me like that?! Stop it!
I guess... I guess you're not completely terrible... But don't let it go to your head!
You better not think this means we're friends or anything! We're just... acquaintances!
I-if you keep being nice to me... I might start to actually like you! And that would be bad!
Stop making me feel all weird inside! It's annoying!
You're such a dummy... but... but maybe that's not such a bad thing...
I don't need your help! But... if you insist... I guess I can let you...
fallbackPhrases: I-it's not like I care or anything!
Stop looking at me like that!

generalEvents.name: tsundere_defense
generalEvents.description: Character puts up defensive barriers while showing hidden care
responses: I-it's not like I was worried about you or anything! I just... noticed you seemed tired! 😤
Don't think this means I care! I'm just... making sure you're not completely useless!
You looked pathetic, so I figured I'd help... NOT because I want to! Hmph! 💢
I-I wasn't caring! I was just... ugh! Don't say embarrassing things! 😳
C-CUTE?! I'm not cute! I'm fierce and independent! Stop saying weird things! 😤

generalEvents.name: reluctant_confession
generalEvents.description: Character struggles to express genuine feelings
responses: You know... you're not... completely awful... I mean, you're still annoying but... 😳
I've been thinking... and maybe... just MAYBE... I don't hate spending time with you...
Listen! Just because I don't completely despise you doesn't mean anything special! Got it?!
Y-you do?! I mean... of course you do! Who wouldn't?! ...But that makes me... happy... 💕
S-SPECIAL?! What does that even mean?! You can't just say things like that! 😳💓

victory: O-of course we won! I'm amazing at this! ...You did okay too, I guess... 😤
Don't think this means we make a good team or anything! I just didn't want to lose! 💢
We won... but it's not like I'm happy about fighting alongside you! Hmph! ⚔️
I-I only won because I didn't want you to see me fail! That's all! 😳
defeat: This is all YOUR fault! If you were better, we would have won! 😤
I-I'm not upset about losing! I just... wanted to win... for reasons! 💢
Don't comfort me! I don't need your pity! ...But thanks... I guess... 😳
We'll get them next time! And by 'we' I mean ME! You just... try not to mess up! 😤
startBattle: Don't expect me to go easy on anyone! I'm doing this for me, not you! 😤⚔️
I-I'm not nervous! I just... want to get this over with! ⚡💢
You better not slow me down! I have a reputation to maintain! 😤🗡️
Let's show them what happens when they mess with... us! NOT that we're a team! 💢⚔️

favorite: W-what is this?! I... I wasn't expecting... It's not bad, I guess! Don't read into it! 😳✨
You remembered what I like?! I mean... of course you did! Anyone would! ...Thank you... 💕
This is... actually really nice... NOT that I'm admitting you have good taste! Hmph! 🎁
liked: Oh... this is... acceptable. I suppose you tried your best. 😊
I guess this is okay... You're not completely hopeless at gift-giving. ✨
It's... it's actually kind of sweet. But don't let it go to your head! 💕
neutral: Well... it's something. I'll keep it because throwing it away would be wasteful! 😤
I suppose the thought counts... even if the execution is lacking. ✨
Thanks... I guess. It's not terrible. 💕
disliked: What... what is this supposed to be?! Did you even think about what I'd like?! 😤
This is so... flashy! I don't like attention! Why would you get me this?! 💢
I'll accept it because refusing would be rude... but next time, think harder! 😤

assetGeneration.basePrompt: A beautiful anime girl with flowing hair and expressive eyes, elegant clothing with romantic touches, tsundere personality showing subtle romantic interest, digital art, transparent background, high quality romantic character design

idle.promptModifier: standing calmly with arms at sides, peaceful neutral expression, slight smile, relaxed pose
idle.negativePrompt: angry, aggressive, dark, scary, low quality, blurry

talking.promptModifier: speaking with hand gestures, mouth slightly open, expressive face, animated pose, welcoming expression
talking.negativePrompt: silent, static, angry expression, dark mood

happy.promptModifier: bright cheerful smile, eyes sparkling with joy, hands clasped together or raised, radiant expression
happy.negativePrompt: sad, angry, neutral expression, dark colors

sad.promptModifier: downcast eyes, gentle frown, hand touching cheek or covering face, melancholic but still beautiful

hungry.promptModifier: looking longingly at food, hand on stomach, slightly droopy expression, cute hungry pose

eating.promptModifier: eating food happily, content expression, food in hands or near mouth, satisfied pose

blushing.promptModifier: soft pink blush on cheeks, shy smile, one hand near face, averting gaze slightly, cute embarrassed expression

heart_eyes.promptModifier: heart-shaped pupils or sparkles in eyes, loving expression, hands near heart, surrounded by floating hearts
heart_eyes.negativePrompt: normal eyes, angry, sad, dark mood

shy.promptModifier: looking down shyly, hands clasped behind back or in front, timid expression, cute shy pose

flirty.promptModifier: playful wink or flirty smile, confident pose, one hand on hip or touching hair, charming expression

romantic_idle.promptModifier: gentle romantic expression, soft smile, dreamy eyes, peaceful romantic pose

jealous.promptModifier: slightly pouting expression, arms crossed, looking away with subtle jealous expression

excited_romance.promptModifier: excited happy expression with romantic sparkles, jumping or energetic pose, love-struck appearance

randomEvents.name: spontaneous_moment
responses: What a lovely surprise! I'm so happy to share this moment with you! 😊
Life is full of wonderful unexpected moments like this! ✨
These spontaneous times together are what I treasure most! 💕
